tool_description: Calculates profit margins, break-even points, and margin impacts of price changes for products.

current_price.description: Current selling price of the product

unit_cost.description: Cost per unit including materials and direct costs

fixed_costs.description: Fixed costs allocated to this product

error_messages: Invalid price: current_price must be positive number
Invalid cost: unit_cost must be non-negative number
Invalid fixed costs: fixed_costs must be non-negative number
Invalid volume: volume must be positive integer
Unprofitable pricing: current_price is below unit_cost resulting in negative margins
usage: Specify product_id, current_price, and unit_cost as minimum parameters. Optionally include fixed_costs and volume for more detailed margin analysis.

net_margin_percent.description: Net profit margin including fixed costs

total_profit.description: Total profit at specified volume and price
